name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-bookingspace
title: Booking Spaces ACE
shortDescription: This sample shows how to build an ACE with a card view and quick view to search spaces in the campus and be able to quickly check previous/upcoming reservations.
longDescription: This sample shows how to build an ACE with a card view and quick view to search spaces in the campus and be able to quickly check previous/upcoming reservations.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
